actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit an agency or department of the United States from establishing or implementing an internal policy that discourages or prohibits the selection of a resort or vacation destination as the location for a conference or event, and for other purposes.
short_title: Protect America's Cities from Government Blacklist Act of 2012
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Protect America's Cities from Government Blacklist Act of 2012 - Prohibits any federal agency or department from establishing or implementing an internal policy regarding travel, event, meeting, or conference locations that discourages or prohibits the selection of a location that is perceived to be a resort or vacation destination.

titles.title: Protect America's Cities from Government Blacklist Act of 2012
Protect America's Cities from Government Blacklist Act of 2012

A bill to prohibit an agency or department of the United States from establishing or implementing an internal policy that discourages or prohibits the selection of a resort or vacation destination as the location for a conference or event, and for other purposes.
